metadata.title: CVE-2023-52785 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: ufs: core: Fix racing issue between ufshcd_mcq_abort() and ISRIf command timeout happens and cq complete IRQ is raised at the same time,ufshcd_mcq_abort clears lprb->cmd and a NULL pointer deref happens in theISR. Error log:ufshcd_abort: Device abort task at tag 18Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address0000000000000108pc : [0xffffffe27ef867ac] scsi_dma_unmap+0xc/0x44lr : [0xffffffe27f1b898c] ufshcd_release_scsi_cmd+0x24/0x114

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
